name: Quest of the Dragonfly (Beta version: 1.0.3)
description:
The quest of the Dragonfly is an RPG Maker MV game I'm currently working on.

It's about you (the player) waking up and having no memories of what your doing here. You then seek a stone that could bring back your memory locked away deep underground.

Right-Click to go back/menu/backspace (When you right click at the start of a battle you can try to escape)

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Click on a tile to dash to it

ENTER to interact

Please let me know if you run into any bugs

Graphics by:

Dragoonwys

PandaMaru

Ækashics

Music by:

Maoudamashii

Yufuruka

Plugins by:
Yanfly

SomeRandomDude
